descript.abstract: This ortho imagery is the result of private and government entities working together under the guidance of Utah Automated Geographic Reference Center (AGRC). Image acquisition began on 21 April 2009 and was completed on 13 May 2009. Processing and delivery was completed by Mapcon Mapping Inc. with final delivery October of 2009. AGRC also provides a wide range of Geographic Information System (GIS) support to the State of Utah. This ortho imagery reflects .25 M ground sample distance (GSD) rectified to a horizontal accuracy of within a radial RMSE of 0.75 M, at a 95% confidence. The georeferenced tiff format of this product is based on the US National Grid 2,000 M x 2,000 M tiles, and is rectified to UTM zone 12 coordinate system NAD83(CORS96) meters using auto-correlated DEM or LiDAR DEM (2006-2007) where available.
descript.purpose: The primary purpose of this dataset is for Geographic Information System (GIS) measurements in support of multiple resource management and inventory activities. Utah AGRC strives to develop partnerships to leverage the planned acquisition of imagery statewide to better meet state, local, and federal needs.

idinfo.accconst: There are no limitations for access.
idinfo.datacred: This data set was created and delivered by Mapcon Mapping, Inc. under State of Utah Contract #096267

dataqual.logic: Imagery was inspected by USGS-AGRC, visually and via custom computer scripts, against contract requirements and specifications. Final inspection reports maybe obtained from AGRC's QA department.

horizpa.horizpar: Tiles have a contractual horizontal accuracy specification of 0.75 m for 95% all well defined points tested fall against the same location identified on government furnished baseline orthophoto control imagery. Final inspection reports maybe obtained for AGRC's QA department.

procstep.procdesc: This GeoTIFF meets all required specifications as outlined in the contract.

overview.eaover: 24-bit pixels, 3 band color (RGB) represent brightness values 0 - 255

distinfo.distliab: The creators, custodians, and/or distributors of this data makes no representations of any kind, including but not limited to the warranties of merchantability or fitness for a particular use, nor are any such warranties to be implied with respect to the data. User assumes all risk for its use.

digtinfo.formname: GeoTIFF - Georeferenced Tagged Image File Format

stdorder.fees: contact the AGRC for more information

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
